description: Assist with redeeming 32-character codes on supported check-in and redeem pages.

settings.title: Redemption Assist
settings.enableDesc: Automatically detect redemption codes on supported pages and show a redeem prompt.
settings.description: Configure how the extension detects and assists with redeeming codes on supported pages.

messages.redeemFailed: Redemption failed. Please try again later.
messages.promptConfirm: Detected a possible redemption code {{code}} on this page. Try auto redeem for this site?
messages.promptSource: This prompt is provided by the All API Hub extension.
messages.noAccountForUrl: No matching account found for this site. Please add the site as an account in All API Hub, then try again.

success.settingsSaved: Redemption assist settings have been saved.

error.saveFailed: Failed to save redemption assist settings.

accountSelect.title: Select an account to use for redemption
accountSelect.titleMultiple: Multiple accounts available, please select one for redemption
accountSelect.titleFallback: No account matched this site, please select one manually
